summary: Completed comprehensive testing of HILLIA Admin Interface (Reading Room). All 23 backend API tests passed (100%). All 30 frontend UI tests passed. Admin authentication, questionnaire management, contact management, statistics display, and logout functionality all working correctly.

issues: Missing data-testid attributes on interactive elements (forms, buttons, inputs) - recommended for better test automation

action_items: Consider adding data-testid attributes to admin form elements for better test automation support
critical_code_review_comments: Code quality is good - proper separation of concerns between frontend and backend
Rate limiting implemented correctly with in-memory storage (note: resets on server restart)
Password hashing using SHA256 is adequate for this use case
Session storage used for auth tokens - appropriate for admin interface
seed_data_creation: Created test questionnaire and contact submissions during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All admin features tested and working. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_admin_api.py cover: health check, admin auth (valid/invalid/missing credentials), admin stats, questionnaire CRUD, contact CRUD, and rate limiting. Frontend tests verified: login page, wrong credentials error, successful login redirect, overview stats display, questionnaire list/detail/status update/notes, contact list/detail/status update/notes, and logout functionality.

backend: Get questionnaire list with status filter
Get contact list with status filter
